thread.title: Alabama vs. Clemson score: National championship 2017 live blog, highlights
thread.title_full: Alabama vs. Clemson score: National championship 2017 live blog, highlights

author: Chip Patterson
title: Alabama vs. Clemson score: National championship 2017 live blog, highlights
text:
11m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Over 100 days after the 2016 college football season kicked off, the 2017 College Football Playoff National Championship is upon us with a tremendous amount of history on the line. 
No. 1 Alabama is looking for its fifth national title under Nick Saban, who himself is hoping to match Bear Bryant with his sixth championship ring . The Crimson Tide are also vying to win back-to-back crowns, which would mark the fourth time in program history they've achieved such a feat. All of this as Bama shockingly switched offensive coordinators the week of the game. More CFP How to watch live 
On the other side, No. 2 Clemson has redemption on its mind after 45-40 to Alabama just one year ago. The Tigers have not captured a national championship since 1981 and have been unable to defeat the Crimson Tide since 1905. (Alabama is 13-3 in the all-time series with 13 straight victories.) 
It all goes down at 8 p.m. ET live at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida. CBS Sports will be with you the entire way with live scores, updates, highlights and stats from the game. If you are unable to view the live blog below, please click here. 
Thanks for stopping by.
